description: GPAR Xiengkhouang - Strengthening public administration for poverty reduction and equitable growth

subproject.description: GPAR Xieng Khouang sets out to strengthen the operational capacities of selected government institutions at the provincial and district levels to contribute to poverty reduction and equitable economic growth. As such the project will pilot governance and public administration reforms with emphasis on more effective and participatory services in the agricultural sector and strengthen financial management and accountability. The project will facilitate institutional change to create an enabling environment especially for farmers and local entrepreneurs, notably by enhancing people’s greater involvement and ownership. The project has the following outputs.  Output 1. Local administration’s ability increased to respond to citizens’ and entrepreneurs’ demand and needs                                                                                                                                                Output 2. Local administration enabled to implement decisions and reach provincial and district objectives in a transparent, coordinated and cost-effective manner                                                                                                                  Output 3. Local and central authorities have Improved capacities to monitor progress in service delivery and poverty eradication and to plan for future governance improvements                                                                                        Output 4. Project support
subproject.title: GPAR Xieng Khouang

title: GPAR Xieng Khouang: Poverty Reduction & Equitable Growth
